input.sentences: i went to a festival this weekend with my family .
there were safety officers on bikes making sure we were safe .
then the parade began and there were bagpipe players .
there were also awesome costumes walking down .
the parade ended with two people giving speeches to us .
output.sentences: We're here for the Godiva Festival.
We felt safe in the crowd thanks to the presence of security.
We're very excited to be a part of the music and festivities!
It's so cool to see all the different people and costumes.
The speakers were excellent and we had a lot of fun.
